net.conquiris.schema

Interface TextSchemaItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FieldNameProperty, IsIndexedFlag, IsStoredFlag, SchemaItem
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    StreamSchemaItem, UUIDSchemaItem

    public interface TextSchemaItem
extends SchemaItem
    Marker interface for textual schema items.
    Author:
    Andres Rodriguez
